## ResizeParameters.observer property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
observer?: 'singleton' | 'new' | ResizeObserver;
```

## Remarks

Be default, a singleton ResizeObserver is used for all actions for better performance. You can use this option to create a new ResizeObserver or provide your own.
